game_description: Ever wanted to create your very own custom race tracks, then experience what it'd feel like to race on them in first-person? RaceMaker VR allows you to build your own unique racing masterpieces, then go head-to-head against the CPU or the clock (in Time Trial mode) on your custom creations!
review_1: I TRIED TO TURN IN THE GAME AND IT PUT ME IN A STRAIGHT LINE INSTEAD OF WHAT I WAS TRYING TO DO! THE TURNING ONLY WORKS SOME OF THE TIMES! BECAUSE OF THIS MY HEADSET ALMOST GOT SMASHED CAUSE I HAD SOME GAMER RAGE! FIX THIS OR I'M NEVER PLAYING AGAIN! Overall the rest of the game works but I could have gotten a new headset because of this!
review_2: This game is very fun but has a few bugs this includes not being able to turn and sometimes spawning inside the track. Even with these bugs the game still finds a way to be fun. If this game didn’t have these bugs it would easily be 5 stars. Suggestion add a no motion sickness option if possible!
review_3: I love the game and the whole idea of making your own track and racing on it, if you can get used to the controls and know how to build a good track it’s really enjoyable! Only reason I’m giving it 4 stars is because of some AI bugs. I’ve encountered that some of the AI can get stuck on walls or on jumps but aside from that I haven’t found many problems with it. I’ll definitely continue playing it!
review_4: This game has endless opportunities! Whatever you want to do. And then adding the multiplayer to the game… chefs kiss it’s perfect. I don’t normally feel comfortable in racing games but I didn’t feel sick at all while playing this. Power ups are fun to mess around with and the community is very chill. It’s very mature at the moment not a lot of crying children when you beat them.
review_5: The game is fun I enjoy making tracks and racing on them but there are a few bugs and a tutorial would be nice as the controls were a little hard. If you like build and/or racing this game is a 100% get as the bugs will be fixed in updates so I recommend this game and BEST PART ITS FREE so I think it a really good game
